reviewInProgress.title: Review in Progress
reviewInProgress.descriptionJSX: Thank you for uploading your document. We are now reviewing it and you will receive an email from us in the next three days. In the meantime, you can already select your modules on the <1>Explore Page</1> or see other learners in your area <3>on the Community Page</3>.

description01: Scan your document or take a photo and upload it here. Make sure all the necessary information is clearly visible. Check our
description03: for uploading in the best quality.
upload: Click here or drop files to upload your document.
uploadSuccessfulDescription: Thank you for uploading your document. We are now reviewing it and you will receive an email from us in the next three days.

modal.yesDescription: Upload official documents only. Your full name, date of birth, and the expiration date should be clearly visible.
modal.noDescription: Don’t upload anything that is not an official document, like your CV, a picture of you, a flag, or any other photo.

documentAlternate.part01: You don’t have one of these documents? No problem, you can upload a similar document and we will review it. Click on
documentAlternate.part04: Kiron will store your documents safely on our servers and they will not be shared with others.
documentAlternate.part05: Learn more about why we need your document

sampleDocuments.title: Please upload your passport or a form of identification. Take a look at some examples:

warningTextNationality: Please enter your nationality on the profile page before reuploading your documents
